Name: The Knight Cup
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
20 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Elizaveta, this cocktails creator, says, "To create my cocktail it was important for me to emphasize the sense of loyalty, tradition and family heritage in Bacardí Carta Blanca. The knight embodies these qualities, as a symbol of nobility, loyalty and honour. The Knight Cap - for those who respect these qualities and also want a little knight's courage."
History: The overall Bacardí Legacy 2013 winning cocktail and the winner of The Russian 2013 Bacardí Legacy, created by Elizaveta Evdokimova, Russia.
Nutrition: One serving of The Knight Cup contains 169 calories
